verbose_text: The synthesis of DCM-Bpin was successfully achieved in one step by the condensation of 4-formylphenylboronic acid, pinacol ester and DCM (using the previously described procedure).20 Heating to reflux in ethanol and piperidine for 4.5 hours, followed by filtration and washing with cold ethanol produced DCM-Bpin as a yellow solid in 62% yield (Scheme XREF_FIG).18 The UV-Vis and fluorescence behavior of DCM-Bpin was evaluated in pH 7.40 buffer solution (5% DMSO was required to improve solubility).
